channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Mail, Calendar, and People in Windows 8.1 App Store
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Mail, Calendar, and People in Windows 8.1 App Store

item.title: CVE-2018-8305|2024-08-05T06:54:36.331Z -- microsoft -- mail%2C%20calendar%2C%20and%20people%20in%20windows%208.1%20app%20store
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Windows Mail Client when a message is opened, aka "Windows Mail Client Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Mail, Calendar, and People in Windows 8.1 App Store.
